directions: In a medium bowl, beat together cream cheese, green onion, lemon juice, horseradish, and cayenne. Fold in salmon until well blended. Cover, and chill in the refrigerator at least 2 hours.
Shape the cream cheese and salmon mixture into a log, approximately 8 inches long. Roll log in pecans and parsley to coat. Refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: 1 (14.75 ounce) can salmon, drained and flaked
title: Pecan Salmon Roll
